patterns: How can I apply for admission?
What is the eligibility criteria for admission ?
responses: Admissions are open from May to July. You need 12th grade pass certificate with minimum 60% marks. Application forms are available online on the college website.
To get admitted, you must have passed 12th grade with at least 60% marks. The admission process includes online application, document verification, and seat allocation.
Admission requirements: 12th pass with 60% marks minimum. Apply online between May and July. Bring original documents for verification.
We offer B.Tech programs in three domains.
Our courses include B.Tech (Computer Science, Electronics and Communication and Electrical Engineering).
B.Tech program fees: ₹ 2,35,200 per year. Scholarships are available for meritorious students and those from economically weaker sections.
Annual tuition fee is ₹2,35,200 per year for B.Tech. We offer scholarships for top scorers and need-based financial aid.
Fee structure: ₹2,35,200 per annum for B.Tech. Multiple scholarship schemes are available for eligible students.
We have well-equipped labs, a central library with 50,000+ books, separate hostels for boys and girls, sports complex, cafeteria, and high-speed WiFi campus.
Our facilities include modern labs, extensive library, comfortable hostels, sports grounds, dining facilities, and full campus WiFi coverage.
College facilities: advanced laboratories, digital library, accommodation facilities, sports arena, food courts, and seamless internet connectivity.

patterns: How can I contact the college?
responses: You can contact the office through Landline: 011-27662880 and Email ID: office@fot.du.ac.in; dean_fot@du.ac.in
Yes, high-speed Wi-Fi is available.
Academic year runs from August to May. Semester exams are in December (odd) and May (even). Detailed calendar is on the college portal.
Calendar: August to May academic year. Mid-semester exams in October/November, end-semester in December/May.
Academic schedule: Classes Aug-May, mid-semester exams Oct-Nov, final exams Dec (odd semester) and May (even semester).
Our faculty consists of experienced professors with PhDs and industry experience.
We have qualified faculty with 80% PhD holders and industry expertise. Small class sizes ensure individual attention.
Excellent faculty team: PhD-qualified professors with academic and industry experience .
You can find the faculty list by clicking on the following link: https://fot.du.ac.in/Administration/Faculty

Yes, hostels are provided but there are no separate hostels for BTech students.
You can apply for hostel during the admission process.

patterns: How many books can I issue?
how many books can I issue
responses: Library is open from 9 AM to 8 PM.
Students can issue up to 3 books for 15 days.

patterns: Does the college provide placement assistance?

patterns: Which departments are under Faculty of Technology?
responses: There are three departments under faculty of technology : Department of Computer Science and Engineering , Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering and Department of Electrical Engineering.
Department of Computer Science and Engineering: https://fot.du.ac.in/Departments/Computer-Science-and-Engineering
Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering : https://fot.du.ac.in/Departments/Electronics-and-Communication-Engineering
Department of Electrical Engineering : https://fot.du.ac.in/Departments/Electrical-Engineering
